analysis.key_quote: I urge you to not alter schedule F and to continue to have government workers hired and operating on a non-partisan basis with civil service protections.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of non-partisan hiring processes and civil service protections, which are threatened by the implementation of Schedule F. It highlights concerns about politicization and the degradation of public services when jobs are influenced by political loyalty.
